mutants.original_line: result = [p for p in persons if term in str(p.values())]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [p for p in persons if term not in str(p.values())]

mutants.original_line: result = [p for p in persons if all(str(item) in str(p.items()) for item in criteria.items())]
mutants.mutated_line: result = [p for p in persons if all((str(item) not in str(p.items()) for item in criteria.items()))]
